name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Teamscale ADOS Test Runner Event Listener

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Catches events in the Azure DevOps Test Runner and forwards them to a Teamscale server.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to automatically detect start, end and further events of a test run that is done in Azure DevOps. It is used to record code coverage per test case for manually ran software tests on a SAP Netweaver® system and works in conjunction with the Software Intelligence Suite Teamscale. It requires a running Teamscale instance as well as the Teamscale Connector for SAP Netweaver® AS ABAP® to be installed on the test environment.
